text: It doesn’t exist yet as part of Fabric. Off chain storage is the responsibility of the application sending transactions to Hyperledger. For the Next architecture it would be really nice to see this as a more integrated feature for endorsers. Basically the submitting peer only passes hashes to consensus, but participating endorsers keep off chain storage with the data which was hashed. <@U0Z541B3P> and I have discussed, but don’t have firm details yet. Would love to hear use cases
